content.rendered:
A hacked or compromised site causes numerous headaches for a business, including loss of customer confidence, loss of revenue, expensive cleanups and downtime during backup restoration, as well as Google blocks for malware or viruses, and sanctions from hosting providers if your site is used to send spam.

This package serves to secure your WordPress site from hacks, exploits and malware, and includes:

  • WordPress setup
  • Wordfence security audit
  • Priority updates based on Wordfence report
  • Changes to database name, strong passwords
  • Ensuring use of salts
